name: Sprout (itch) (OneEyedBanshee)
description:
For this project we attempted to make a movement based puzzle game using cultures from Latin american cultures. Our goal was to create a character that resembles the last hope for lost spirits and the tree itself to transcend into the next life and save them from an already destroyed world due to pollution and other human factors.

We hope to continue working and developing more areas and mechanics for the game later on.
